      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3ae5ddce-8ba3-4bcd-9589-2498125c0927#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A békák légzőszervei</string>
            <string language="en">Breathing organs of frogs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmenorgane der Frösche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Organes de respiration des grenouilles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órgãos respirando das râs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organi di respirazione delle rane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπνοή των οργάνων των βατράχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órganos de respiración de ranas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A bélcsatorna és a légzőszervek elhelyezkedése, valamint a tüdő szerkezete - rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Localization of intestinal canal and breathing organs, as well structure of lung - drawing</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kétéltűek,  légzés,  bőrlégzés,  </string>
            <string language="en">amphibia, breathing, perspiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lokalisation des intestinalen Kanals und der 
atmenorgane, außerdem Struktur des Lungenflügels - zeichnend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Localisation de canal intestinal et d'organes de 
respiration, aussi bien structure de poumon - dessinant</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Localization do canal intestinal e de órgãos 
respirando, também estrutura do pulmão - desenhando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Localizzazione del canale intestinale e degli 
organi di respirazione, pure struttura del polmone - dissipando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εντοπισμός των εντερικών οργάνων καναλιών και 
αναπνοής, επίσης δομή του πνεύμονα - σχέδιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización del canal intestinal y de los 
órganos de respiración, también estructura del pulmón - trazando</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amphibien, atmend, Schweiß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amphibiens, respirant, transpiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">amphibia, respirando, perspiração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anfibi, respiranti, traspirazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμφίβια, αναπνοή, διαπνοή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">anfibias, respirando, transpiración</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
